thread.title: Cameron and Xi Jinping on steel industry and human rights
thread.title_full: Cameron and Xi Jinping on steel industry and human rights - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Cameron and Xi Jinping on steel industry and human rights
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Cameron and Xi Jinping on steel industry and human rights 21 October 2015 Last updated at 16:12 BST
David Cameron and Chinese President Xi Jinping are asked about the state of the global steel industry - and also human rights - by BBC political editor Laura Kuenssberg.
They were speaking at a press conference after their Downing Street talks.
